title: Fanfic: Crazy day
content:
This takes place in he year 2020, when Keen is 26 years old and is married to a pretty woman![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] Her name is Eliza Blaze.

Chapter one: Mama mia!

Billy Blaze, 26 year old genius was talking with his wife, Eliza Blaze, when all of the sudden, a UFO abducted them both! Billy put on his helmet and transformed into Commander Keen- defender of the universe!

Unfortunately, Eliza was right next to him, and he didn't notice her, so his identity was revealed to her. When Keen found out, he said to her "You've been abducted too?? Golly, gee, you cough me tranformin'. Please don't give out my identity!!! Or I will be at more risk!! You don't want to lose me!!" Eliza said "I wouldn't dare tell!"

Keen searched for Mortimer and aliens while his wife looked for her purse and her cell phone. Keen found out this "UFO" was really Mortimer's ship. Keen grabbed his N Stunner and was cautious. Eliza Blaze saw Mortimer and said "do I know you?"

Mortimer saw her and said "Yes, I am Keen's cousin. His evil cousin." Eliza said "Well being evil isn't good!" Keen saw Mortimer and shouted to Eliza "Honey, look out!" Mortimer shot his N Stunner and nearly hit (and stunned) Keen's wife, but Keen saved her from being stunned.

"Thank you" said Eliza.

Don't hit that dial, 'cause Chapter 2 is comin' your way!Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Blood!!!! Gore!!!!! I can't stand it!!!1!11!!1111!!1
content:
Aaaahh! The blood! The gore! I hate blood and gore!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dead.gif[/img]

Chapter 2: Children??? I can't believe it! Yoogh!!

Mortimer said "I am going to vaporize your children now!!" Keen said "Not so fast! You are not going to do that! I will save the world!" Mort said "I will destroy it!' So Keen put Mort in a machine which turned Mort into a hamster.

Keen has saved his children! But there doesn't seem to be a way back home- The ship is too big to land on the earth: just touching the earth would push the whole planet!!

So how do they move around it so quikly? Anything that goes inside it becomes so big that everything seems "normal" sized.

Mortimer is the only one who knows what every single control in the control room does, and he's ben turned into a hamster, and Keen forgot to bring a machine that turns animal language into human language.

Find out what Keen and his wife do next in Chapter 3!Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: Blood!!!! Gore!!!!! I can't stand it!!!1!11!!1111!!1

Give your story some basic direction. Learn basic grammar. [center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Zibble
content:
Chapter 3: Finding out the controls

Keen decided that the only way to do anything was to find out what the controls did. Mort shouted to them "Thst big black joystick controls the ship!" Keen was astonished. Eliza was simply dumbfounded.

Keen said to Mort "YOU CAN TALK??!?!?? BUT HOW CAN THAT BE???!?? YOUR A HAMSTER!!!!!!!!" Mort said "This machine's ability to effect speech only effects your voice- it doesn't effect how you talk. I was sorta thinking of throwing you in when it was set on 'dog', but I never got the chance to do that, and I can't do that now anyways."

Keen took Mort out of the machine and put him in a hamster cage. Now Keen could hear Mort much easier. Keen accidentally pushed a button, and it made the ship (and everything inside it) normal sized. Now Keen could finally land on a planet!

Episode 4 is comin' your way, so don't change the channel!Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey

title: Whee!!
content:
the forum is pretty quiet in this topic today, isn't it?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yawn.gif[/img]

Chapter 4: Wheee!!

Keen used the joy stick and flew a place that has a weird gas, and it made Keen and his wife grow a beard uncontrollably, and soon, it was really long.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] They decided to leave the planet and as so as they did, their beards disappeared.

They went to another planet that made them drool uncontrollably.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] They left and as soon as they did they stopped drooling. Keen did not know where to go. He hads to go home, but they were to far away from it. And they didn't want to go faster than the galactic speed limit either (if there is one). They finally rested at a place where cats literally ruled.

This planet was named Felinea (Fee-Liyn-eah). Cats are as smart as people in that place.

After one day, they left, and Eliza was sneezing and sneezing and sneezing, 'cause she's 'lergic to cats. Keen drove to an other planet.

Stay tuned for chapter 5...Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey

title: (insert a subject here)
content:
Chapter 5: More of the story... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

Keen went to a planet where everyone looked like this- [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img] Keen was starting to look confused. He found out that they are not people, but dopefish!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] Keen ran in the ship and drove to a place Mortimer told them to find and destroy, and didn't enter it, tryed to shoot it, but it reflected the shot, and nearly hit the ship!!!

Keen saw NaJaWa in the ship. He had been turned into a humming bird! He saw Harvey in the ship. He had been turned into a dog!! He saw LevelLord in the ship. She had been turned into a frog!!! All because of Mort's transformation machine. The same machine that turned Mort into a hamster.

See how they destroyed the area Mort wanted destroyed in chapter 6!Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
